Source: Durante o tempo que passam no Chile, percebem a necessidade de uma tradução para o espanhol do Livro de Mórmon.
First English Translation: During their time in Chile, they realized the need for a Spanish translation of the Book of Mormon.
Final Refined Translation: During their time in Chile, they come to understand the necessity of a Spanish translation of the Book of Mormon.

Source: Posteriormente, o mesmo sonho se repetiu.
First English Translation: Later, the same dream was repeated.
Final Refined Translation: Subsequently, the same dream recurred.

Source: Há um tipo de alegria e satisfação que somente é compreendida por meio de sentimentos espirituais.
First English Translation: There is a kind of joy and satisfaction that is only understood through spiritual feelings.
Final Refined Translation: There is a specific type of joy and satisfaction that can only be fully grasped through spiritual emotions.

Source: 5. Exatidão dos Dados Informados.
First English Translation: 5. Accuracy of Submitted Data.
Final Refined Translation: 5. Accuracy of the Provided Data.

Source: As ordenanças continuarão na sua lista até que alguém as aceite.
First English Translation: Ordinances will remain on your list until someone accepts them.
Final Refined Translation: The ordinances will stay on your list until someone accepts them.

Source: Além de suas próprias provações pessoais, muitos enfrentaram e continuam a enfrentar preconceitos e mal-entendidos culturais mesmo em sua ala ou seu ramo.
First English Translation: In addition to their own personal trials, many have faced and continue to face cultural prejudice and misunderstanding, even in their ward or branch.
Final Refined Translation: In addition to their own personal trials, many have faced and continue to face cultural prejudices and misunderstandings, even within their own congregation or branch.

Source: Ocorreu um erro ao salvar seu retrato.
First English Translation: An error occurred while saving your portrait.
Final Refined Translation: An error occurred while saving your portrait.

Source: Clique na caixa de seleção à esquerda de cada pessoa cujas ordenanças você deseja cancelar a reserva.
First English Translation: Click the check box to the left of each person whose ordinances you want to cancel.
Final Refined Translation: Click the checkbox to the left of each person whose orders you wish to cancel the reservation.

Source: A indexação de registros é o acelerador que dá ao site FamilySearch.org o poder de conectar você aos seus antepassados.
First English Translation: Record indexing is the accelerator that gives the FamilySearch.org site the power to connect you to your ancestors.
Final Refined Translation: The indexing of records serves as the catalyst that empowers the FamilySearch.org website to connect you with your ancestors.

Source: Tabela para listar até quatro gerações de antepassados.
First English Translation: Table to list up to four generations of ancestors.
Final Refined Translation: Table for documenting up to four generations of ancestors.

Source: E essa é a razão, porque o Espírito foi persistente.
First English Translation: And that is the reason, because the Spirit was persistent.
Final Refined Translation: And that is the reason the Spirit remained persistent.

Source: Apesar de as ordenanças vicárias realizadas fora de sequência serem válidas, elas tornam-se eficazes somente depois que forem realizadas as ordenanças exigidas previamente.
First English Translation: Although proxy ordinances performed out of sequence are valid, they become effective only after the previously required ordinances are performed.
Final Refined Translation: Although the proxy ordinances conducted out of sequence are valid, they only take effect once the requisite ordinances that precede them have been completed.

Source: No mundo todo, como irmãos e irmãs no evangelho, podemos aprender uns com os outros, tornar-nos mais unidos e aumentar nosso amor mútuo.
First English Translation: Around the world, as brothers and sisters in the gospel, we can learn from each other, become more united, and increase our love for one another.
Final Refined Translation: Throughout the world, as brothers and sisters in the gospel, we can learn from one another, grow closer together, and deepen our mutual love.

Source: O chamado, Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Prêmio de Compra
First English Translation: The Call, Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Purchase Award
Final Refined Translation: The Announcement of the Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Purchase Prize

Source: O membro da Igreja John M. Bernhisel copiou partes de um manuscrito do Velho Testamento e um manuscrito separado do Novo Testamento cerca de um ano após a morte de Joseph Smith, quando Emma Smith emprestou a Bernhisel os manuscritos por um período de quase três meses.
First English Translation: Church member John M. Bernhisel copied portions of an Old Testament manuscript and a separate New Testament manuscript about a year after Joseph Smith's death, when Emma Smith lent Bernhisel the manuscripts over a period of nearly three months.
Final Refined Translation: John M. Bernhisel, a member of the Church, copied parts from an Old Testament manuscript and a separate New Testament manuscript about one year after the death of Joseph Smith, when Emma Smith lent the manuscripts to Bernhisel for a period of nearly three months.

Source: Enquanto as dimensões, funções e alguns aspectos da sua aparência foram especificados por revelação, outros elementos foram deixados para os líderes e trabalhadores locais decidirem.
First English Translation: While the dimensions, functions, and some aspects of their appearance were specified by revelation, other elements were left to local leaders and workers to decide.
Final Refined Translation: While the dimensions, functions, and some aspects of their appearance were specified by revelation, other elements were left for local leaders and workers to determine.

Source: Acabei de terminar meu primeiro lote!
First English Translation: I just finished my first batch!
Final Refined Translation: I have just finished my first batch!

Source: Incentivamos você a examinar todas as informações encontradas em cada uma das diretrizes antes de enviar.
First English Translation: We encourage you to review all the information found in each of the guidelines before submitting.
Final Refined Translation: We strongly encourage you to carefully examine all the information included in each of the guidelines prior to submitting.

Source: Alguns dias depois de enviar essas cartas, Joseph e seus companheiros na prisão foram levados da cadeia e apresentados a um tribunal superior em Gallatin.
First English Translation: A few days after sending these letters, Joseph and his fellow prisoners were taken from jail and brought before a higher court in Gallatin.
Final Refined Translation: A few days after sending these letters, Joseph and his fellow inmates were removed from jail and presented before a higher court in Gallatin.

Source: Junte-se a nós para preparar o lançamento oficial do novo programa de indexação com base no navegador no site FamilySearch.org!
First English Translation: Join us in preparing the official launch of the new browser-based indexing program on the FamilySearch.org website!
Final Refined Translation: Join us in preparing for the official launch of the new browser-based indexing program at FamilySearch.org!

Source: Talvez esse legado seja o que inspira as gerações futuras a segui-los, ou talvez isso realmente esteja no sangue da família.
First English Translation: Maybe that legacy is what inspires future generations to follow them, or maybe it really is in the family's blood.
Final Refined Translation: Perhaps this legacy inspires future generations to follow in their footsteps, or maybe it is indeed in the family's blood.

Source: Este projeto não tem nenhum lote disponível para retirada.
First English Translation: This project does not have any lots available for withdrawal.
Final Refined Translation: This project has no lots available for pickup.

Final Refined Translation: Child Born Before the Father

Final Refined Translation: Christ praying in Gethsemane

First English Translation: I was very hurt to hear them say old mother Smith, There goes old mother Smith.
Final Refined Translation: I felt very hurt when I heard them refer to her as 'Old Mother Smith'. Look, there's Old Mother Smith passing by again.

First English Translation: If you are using this operating system, download and use Firefox, Chrome, or Safari.
Final Refined Translation: If you are using this operating system, kindly download and utilize Firefox, Chrome, or Safari.

Source: Eu tinha pesquisado por 20 anos para encontrar qualquer registro de casamento ou divórcio dos pais dela.
First English Translation: I had searched for 20 years to find any marriage or divorce records of her parents.
Final Refined Translation: I had spent 20 years searching for any records regarding her parents' marriage or divorce.

Source: Qual é o propósito desta nova página?
First English Translation: What is the purpose of this new page?
Final Refined Translation: What is the purpose of this new page?

Source: Somos gratos por seu trabalho dedicado nessa obra extraordinária.
First English Translation: We are grateful for his dedicated work in this extraordinary work.
Final Refined Translation: We appreciate your dedicated efforts on this extraordinary project.

Final Refined Translation: In your request, kindly provide the following information:

Source: mas agora se sentia abandonado.
First English Translation: But now he felt abandoned.
Final Refined Translation: But now, he felt abandoned.

Source: Em 1976, John F. e Carmen ODonnal foram chamados para presidir a Missão Cidade da Guatemala e, depois, a Missão Guatemala Quetzaltenango.
First English Translation: In 1976, John F. and Carmen ODonnal were called to preside over the Guatemala City Mission and then the Guatemala Quetzaltenango Mission.
Final Refined Translation: In 1976, John F. and Carmen O’Donnell were appointed to preside over the Guatemala City Mission and subsequently the Quetzaltenango Mission in Guatemala.

Source: Kimball assegurou a ele que os membros da área haviam expressado confiança nele.
First English Translation: Kimball assured him that members of the area had expressed confidence in him.
Final Refined Translation: Kimball assured him that the members of the area had expressed their confidence in him.

Source: Nomeado para a Junta Educacional da Igreja
First English Translation: Appointed to the Board of Education, the Church
Final Refined Translation: Appointed to the Church Educational Board

Source: Você será notificado quando um patriarca for atribuído.
First English Translation: You will be notified when a patriarch is assigned.
Final Refined Translation: You will be notified when a patriarch is assigned.

Source: Sem dúvida, milhares de vidas serão modificadas com o resultado do esforço de hoje.
First English Translation: No doubt thousands of lives will be changed as a result of today's effort.
Final Refined Translation: Undoubtedly, thousands of lives will be transformed as a result of today's efforts.

Source: Indexar registros históricos, talvez da terra natal de um antepassado.
First English Translation: Index historical records, perhaps from an ancestor's homeland.
Final Refined Translation: Index historical records, possibly from the homeland of an ancestor.

Source: Sabrina Jill Squires Estados Unidos Colagem e tinta acrílica sobre painel
First English Translation: Sabrina Jill Squires United States Collage and acrylic paint on panel
Final Refined Translation: Sabrina Jill Squires, United States; collage and acrylic paint on panel.

Source: Entrevistas recentes com diretores de indexação da estaca e líderes do sacerdócio mostram como determinadas estacas estão combinando perfeitamente a indexação com outras atividades de história da família em um esforço harmonioso que abençoa a vida em ambos os lados do véu.
First English Translation: Recent interviews with stake indexing directors and priesthood leaders show how particular stakes are seamlessly combining indexing with other family history activities in a harmonious effort that blesses life on both sides of the veil.
Final Refined Translation: Recent interviews with stake indexing directors and priesthood leaders illustrate how certain stakes are perfectly blending indexing with other family history activities in a harmonious effort that brings blessings to lives on both sides of the veil.

Source: Sou tão grata por essas histórias terem sido compartilhadas, mas, não apenas compartilhadas preservadas.
First English Translation: I am so grateful that these stories were shared, but not just shared preserved.
Final Refined Translation: I am so grateful that these stories have been shared, but not only that, they have also been preserved.

Source: Conforme esperado, Joseph a ensinou sobre isso e perguntou se ela seria selada a ele.
First English Translation: As expected, Joseph taught her about this and asked if she would be sealed to him.
Final Refined Translation: As anticipated, Joseph instructed her on this matter and inquired whether she would be bound to him.

Final Refined Translation: Sweden, Church Records of Örebro, 1613-1918; Index 1635-1860

Source: Coloque mais informações e detalhes aqui.
First English Translation: Put more information and details here.
Final Refined Translation: Please include additional information and details in this section.

Source: Mercy perdera outro marido no auge da vida.
First English Translation: Mercy had lost another husband in the prime of her life.
Final Refined Translation: Mercy had lost another husband at the height of her life.

Source: Agora você pode deslizar o nome da pessoa para removê-la do Histórico ou da lista de Antepassados com Tarefas.
First English Translation: You can now swipe the person's name to remove them from the History or Ancestors with Tasks list.
Final Refined Translation: You can now swipe a person's name to remove them from the History or the list of Ancestors with Tasks.

Source: A Firma Unida desempenhou um papel essencial na administração da Igreja de 1832 a 1834, exatamente como Whitney desempenhou um papel primordial na própria firma.
First English Translation: The United Firm played an essential role in the administration of the Church from 1832 to 1834, just as Whitney played a primary role in the firm itself.
Final Refined Translation: The United Firm was instrumental in the administration of the Church between 1832 and 1834, much like Whitney was crucial to the firm itself.

Source: E pensava: Não sou tão digna.
First English Translation: And I thought: I'm not so worthy.
Final Refined Translation: And I thought to myself: I am not worthy.

Source: 3 Néfi 11:10; 15:2124; ver também João 10:16.
First English Translation: 3 Nephi 11:10; 15:2124; see also John 10:16.
Final Refined Translation: 3 Nephi 11:10; 15:21 - 24; see also John 10:16.

Source: Os seis missionários e o motorista começaram a procurar por gasolina, a fim de continuar com sua jornada; por fim, trocaram meia saca de arroz por quinze litros de combustível mesmo sabendo que não seria suficiente para os quase 600 quilômetros de péssimas estradas.
First English Translation: The six missionaries and the driver began to search for gasoline in order to continue with their journey; Finally, they exchanged half a bag of rice for fifteen liters of fuel even though they knew that it would not be enough for the almost 600 kilometers of bad roads.
Final Refined Translation: The six missionaries and the driver started searching for gasoline to continue their journey; ultimately, they traded half a sack of rice for fifteen liters of fuel, fully aware that this would not suffice for the nearly 600 kilometers of terrible roads ahead.

Source: Pouco se sabe sobre o conhecimento e os sentimentos de Emma em relação a esses casamentos, alguns dos quais envolviam compromissos nesta vida, ao passo que outros envolviam compromissos somente para a vida futura.
First English Translation: Little is known about Emma's knowledge and feelings regarding these marriages, some of which involved commitments in this life, while others involved commitments only for the future life.
Final Refined Translation: Very little is known about Emma's understanding and emotions concerning these marriages, some of which engaged commitments in this life, whereas others pertained exclusively to the afterlife.

Source: Clique na seta para fechar o painel.
First English Translation: Click the arrow to close the panel.
Final Refined Translation: Click the arrow to close the panel.

Source: E compreendes seu pensar,
First English Translation: And you understand his thinking,
Final Refined Translation: And you comprehend his way of thinking.

Source: Os acontecimentos em Carthage levaram Joseph Fielding a encher várias páginas de seu diário com comentários sobre a vida, missão e morte de Joseph Smith.
First English Translation: The events at Carthage led Joseph Fielding to fill several pages of his journal with commentary on Joseph Smith's life, mission, and death.
Final Refined Translation: The events in Carthage prompted Joseph Fielding to fill numerous pages in his journal with reflections on the life, mission, and death of Joseph Smith.

Source: O Élder Quentin L. Cook, que falará mais tarde nesta conferência, disse que A liderança da Igreja conclamou a nova geração a liderar o caminho no uso da tecnologia para vivenciar o espírito de Elias, pesquisar seus antepassados e realizar as ordenanças do templo para eles.
First English Translation: Elder Quentin L. Cook, who will speak later in this conference, said Church leadership has called on the rising generation to lead the way in using technology to experience the spirit of Elijah, search for their ancestors, and perform temple ordinances for them.
Final Refined Translation: Elder Quentin L. Cook, who will speak later during this conference, mentioned that the leadership of the Church has urged the new generation to take the lead in utilizing technology to embrace the spirit of Elijah, seek out their ancestors, and carry out temple ordinances on their behalf.

Source: Annie Noble se filiou à Igreja Batista quando se casou.
First English Translation: Annie Noble joined the Baptist Church when she got married.
Final Refined Translation: Annie Noble became a member of the Baptist Church upon her marriage.

Source: Esse recurso aumenta o valor do Catálogo do FamilySearch como auxílio de pesquisa, tornando-se muito mais eficiente passar dos itens do catálogo para os dados digitais online.
First English Translation: This feature increases the value of the FamilySearch Catalog as a research aid, making it much more efficient to move from catalog items to online digital data.
Final Refined Translation: This resource enhances the value of the FamilySearch Catalog as a tool for research, significantly improving the efficiency of transitioning from catalog entries to online digital data.

Source: e mediu mais mil, e me fez passar por águas que me davam pelos lombos.
First English Translation: and he measured a thousand more, and brought me through waters that were up to my loins.
Final Refined Translation: and he measured a thousand more, and led me through waters that came up to my waist.

Source: Defina o endereço de IP estático da impressora.
First English Translation: Set the static IP address of the printer.
Final Refined Translation: Set the static IP address of the printer.

Source: O templo ainda estava longe de ser terminado e, se os santos fugissem da cidade, dificilmente conseguiriam receber sua investidura.
First English Translation: The temple was still far from finished, and if the Saints fled the city, they would hardly be able to receive their endowment.
Final Refined Translation: The temple was still far from completion, and if the Saints were to flee the city, they would likely struggle to receive their endowment.

Source: Precisamos especialmente de ajuda na indexação de registros em espanhol, francês, italiano e português.
First English Translation: We especially need help indexing records in Spanish, French, Italian, and Portuguese.
Final Refined Translation: We especially require assistance in indexing records in Spanish, French, Italian, and Portuguese.

Final Refined Translation: Index by Section Number

Source: Senhorita Dew?, ela disse com um sotaque encantador.

Final Refined Translation: "Miss Dew?" she asked, her voice laced with a charming accent.

Source: Nossas orações devem ser sinceras
First English Translation: Our prayers should be sincere
Final Refined Translation: Our prayers must be sincere

First English Translation: Simple Ways to Celebrate Family History Month: A Trip to the Past
Final Refined Translation: Simple Ways to Celebrate Family History Month: A Journey into the Past

Source: Naquele dia, lembro-me de estar muito cansado, e não querer fazer nada.
First English Translation: That day, I remember being very tired, and not wanting to do anything.
Final Refined Translation: On that day, I recall feeling extremely tired and having no desire to do anything.

Final Refined Translation: If you have submitted the person's information in a GEDCOM file, please include a date or place of death.

Source: As Sociedades de Socorro indicaram pelo menos um auxílio de serviço social por estaca e alguns no âmbito de ala quando necessário.
First English Translation: Relief Societies have indicated at least one social service aid per stake and a few at the ward level when needed.
Final Refined Translation: Relief Societies have indicated that each stake provides at least one social service assistance, with additional support available at the ward level when necessary.

Source: Da mesma forma, ele espera que o aplicativo seja disponibilizado gratuitamente aos milhares de alunos nas salas de aula nos Estados Unidos.
First English Translation: Likewise, he hopes that the app will be made available for free to the thousands of students in classrooms in the United States.
Final Refined Translation: Similarly, he anticipates that the application will be provided free of charge to the thousands of students in classrooms throughout the United States.

Source: Leve seus antepassados com você.
First English Translation: Take your ancestors with you.
Final Refined Translation: Take your ancestors with you.

Source: Alguns dias mais tarde, uma mensagem de Joseph Ball, um missionário que trabalhava nas Ilhas Fox, relatou que os dissidentes de Kirtland haviam enviado cartas para os conversos de Wilford daquele local, tentando lhes influenciar a fé.
First English Translation: A few days later, a message from Joseph Ball, a missionary working in the Fox Islands, reported that the dissidents in Kirtland had sent letters to Wilford's converts there, trying to influence their faith.
Final Refined Translation: A few days later, a message from Joseph Ball, a missionary serving in the Fox Islands, reported that the Kirtland dissidents had sent letters to the converts of Wilford in that area, trying to sway their faith.

Final Refined Translation: This is a new, empty folder.

Source: Para mim foi uma resposta às minhas orações.
First English Translation: For me it was an answer to my prayers.
Final Refined Translation: For me, it was an answer to my prayers.

Source: Sacrificar o Futebol pelo Serviço

Final Refined Translation: Sacrificing Football for the Service

First English Translation: I want to get in touch with someone who is working on my ancestor line.
Final Refined Translation: I would like to connect with someone who is researching my ancestral lineage.

First English Translation: Other people felt that as governor he should not participate in a new religion that might divide the people.
Final Refined Translation: Others believed that, as the governor, he should avoid engaging in a new religion that could potentially divide the populace.

Final Refined Translation: A user of the Family Tree entered a date or location but did not select a pattern.

First English Translation: Talk to them about what they want to do.
Final Refined Translation: Talk to them about what they wish to do.

Final Refined Translation: During the ceremony, President Wilford Woodruff activated an electric switch, and a machine lowered the granite spire into position.

Final Refined Translation: Elder Quentin L. Cook, April 2014

Source: Cada um recebeu uma pequena lente de aumento e um certificado de conclusão.
First English Translation: Each received a small magnifying glass and a certificate of completion.
Final Refined Translation: Each individual received a small magnifying glass along with a certificate of completion.

Source: Na semana seguinte, enquanto Phelps continuava a pensar sobre o que havia acontecido, uma passagem do Novo Testamento veio a sua mente.
First English Translation: The following week, as Phelps continued to think about what had happened, a passage from the New Testament came to his mind.
Final Refined Translation: The following week, while Phelps continued to contemplate what had occurred, a passage from the New Testament came to his mind.

Source: Conte o número de registros na imagem.
First English Translation: Count the number of records in the image.
Final Refined Translation: Count the number of records in the image.

Source: O texto da oração foi adicionado a Doutrina e Convênios como seção 109, em 1876.
First English Translation: The text of the prayer was added to the Doctrine and Covenants as section 109 in 1876.
Final Refined Translation: The text of the prayer was incorporated into the Doctrine and Covenants as Section 109 in 1876.

Source: A maioria dos casos foi julgada por um tribunal do bispo ou pelo sumo conselho.
First English Translation: Most cases were tried by a bishop's tribunal or by the high council.
Final Refined Translation: The majority of cases were adjudicated by either a bishop's court or the supreme council.

Source: Em muitos casos o software do FamilySearch ajuda nesse processo.
First English Translation: In many cases, FamilySearch software helps with this process.
Final Refined Translation: In many instances, the FamilySearch software assists in this process.

Source: Vou como um cordeiro para o matadouro, disse o profeta, mas estou calmo como uma manhã de verão; tenho a consciência limpa em relação a Deus e em relação a todos os homens. Morrerei inocente.
First English Translation: "I am going like a lamb to the slaughter," said the prophet, "but I am calm as a summer morning; I have a clear conscience in relation to God and in relation to all men. I will die innocent.
Final Refined Translation: I go like a lamb to the slaughter," said the prophet, "but I am as calm as a summer morning; my conscience is clear before God and before all men. I will die innocent.

Source: Altere seu perfil de modo a incluir o país em que reside.
First English Translation: Change your profile to include the country you live in.
Final Refined Translation: Please update your profile to include the country where you currently reside.

Source: Peça aos seus pais e avós para falar sobre a vida deles e o que eles se lembram de seus parentes falecidos, e grave suas histórias usando o aplicativo.
First English Translation: Ask your parents and grandparents to tell you about their lives and what they remember about their deceased relatives, and record their stories using the app.
Final Refined Translation: Encourage your parents and grandparents to share their life stories and their memories of deceased relatives, and use the app to record their narratives.

Source: N. Eldon Tanner era primeiro conselheiro na Primeira Presidência na época da desobrigação da irmã Spafford; Tanner e ela foram bons amigos.
First English Translation: N. Eldon Tanner was First Counselor in the First Presidency at the time of Sister Spafford's release; Tanner and she were good friends.
Final Refined Translation: N. Eldon Tanner served as the First Counselor in the First Presidency when Sister Spafford was released; he and she shared a strong friendship.

Source: Entendo que algumas pessoas possam estar com medo de nós, porque elas não nos conhecem.
First English Translation: I understand that some people may be afraid of us, because they don't know us.
Final Refined Translation: I understand that some people might be afraid of us because they don't know who we are.

Source: O usuário não foi encontrado.
First English Translation: The user was not found.
Final Refined Translation: The user was not found.

Source: Acredito que nunca houve uma família mais obediente do que a minha e
First English Translation: I believe there has never been a more obedient family than mine and
Final Refined Translation: I believe that there has never been a family more obedient than mine.

Source: Sinto-me grato por estar aqui com minha esposa, Ruth.
First English Translation: I am grateful to be here with my wife, Ruth.
Final Refined Translation: I feel grateful to be here with my wife, Ruth.

Source: Isso torna o programa mais fácil para aqueles que começarem a usar o programa pela primeira vez.
First English Translation: This makes the program easier for those who start using the program for the first time.
Final Refined Translation: This makes the program more user-friendly for those who are using it for the first time.

Source: Spencer W. Kimball, presidente da Igreja, anuncia que um templo será construído em Tóquio.
First English Translation: Spencer W. Kimball, President of the Church, announces that a temple will be built in Tokyo.
Final Refined Translation: Spencer W. Kimball, President of the Church, announces the construction of a temple in Tokyo.

Source: Em vez de seguir um plano de aula específico, ajude-os com suas necessidades e interesses.
First English Translation: Instead of following a specific lesson plan, help them with their needs and interests.
Final Refined Translation: Instead of following a specific lesson plan, help them to address their unique needs and interests.
